mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_email, user_pw, user_name, user_phone_number, user_birth, user_address, user_address_detail, user_zipcode) VALUES (#{userEmail}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userPhoneNumber}, #{userBirth}, #{userAddress}, #{userAddressDetail}, #{userZipcode})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_email, user_pw, user_name, user_birth, user_address, user_address_detail, user_zipcode, user_phone_number FROM user WHERE user_email = #{userEmail} AND user_pw = #{userPw}
